com.persistit
Class AlertMonitor.History

java.lang.Object
  com.persistit.AlertMonitor.History
Enclosing class:
AlertMonitor
public class AlertMonitor.History
extends Object

Aggregation of AlertMonitor.Events in a category. The history retains the first event, the most recent N events where N is determined by the AlertMonitor.getHistoryLength() attribute, the count of events and other fields used to determine how frequently new notifications are issued.

Author:
peter

poll

public void poll(long now,
                 boolean force)
Issue a log messages and notifications as needed to signify an ongoing condition. This method is called periodically. It keeps track of when the last message was added to the log and writes a new recurring message only as frequently as allowed by AlertMonitor.getErrorLogTimeInterval() or AlertMonitor.getWarnLogTimeInterval().

Parameters:
now - current system time as returned by System.currentTimeMillis()
force - if true and the level is WARN or ERROR, this method emits a notification regardless of whether the notification interval has elapsed; otherwise this method does nothing unless the interval has elapsed.
